articles.title: Humanity's First-Ever Exoplanet Discovery Was an Unbelievable Fluke - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In the early 1990s, planetary history was made. In 1992, two astronomers, Alexander Wolszczan and Dale Frail, published a paper in Nature announcing the discovery of the very first planets outside the Solar System.
